attributes.action: Explanation required re apparent impossibility of discontinuous contrails.
attributes.background:
Deep Blue skies now destroyed. Visibility permanently reduced. Poisonous spray suspected. Old photographs show true blue skies. Nobody under 20 can remember them. Understanding people are very fearful. Soil analyses reveal toxic levels of Aluminium and Barium.
Chemical trails denied officially.

rejection.details: We're not sure what you are asking the government or Parliament to do. If you would like the Government to provide funding for research into this subject, you could start a petition asking for that.
